name: Gallows Choice
description:
A classic for great fun, a virtual and improved gallows game!
His purpose is to be able to guess the word before hanging the poor man on the gallows, on the brink of death. Play in random word mode, trying to guess a word, or play with a family member/friend by entering the keyword.
You can also edit and place your own words in the game database in a super easy way.
The game is for fun alone, with friends or with the whole family!
Learn new words or troll your family/friends with strange words.

Guess the word and save the poor man from the gallows!
